summary:
Thank you for visiting my LinkedIn profile!

I have a background in Information and Knowledge Management. An combination of BSc and MSc about the impact of information and information technologies on business behavior and the economy at large. I wrote my research thesis about the adoption of in-store mobile payments. Others would describe me as a social, well-organized, hard-working, responsible and enthusiastic young professional. Born as a member of Generation Y, I was raised with access to internet and social media. I am enthusiastic about marketing, innovation, e-commerce and business & technology.

Currently I am working at Bright Digital as a HubSpot Consultant. Bright is the Hubspot partner in the Netherlands. We connect people, data and technology - using HubSpot - with the goal to improve the customer experience and commercial performance of our clients. We work daily with over 40 professionals in the field of sales, marketing, content, design and technology to realize the growth ambitions of our clients. Through our full-service approach and HubSpot as our main tool, we are able to optimise commercial processes and serve an excellent customer experience across all touchpoints.

Want to know more about Bright Digital?
- https://www.brightdigital.com/

Or you can send me a DM here or contact me via email at ruben@brightdigital.com
________________________________________________

➛ Keywords: SEA, SEO, Affiliate Marketing, E-mail Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Advertising, Big Data, Hubspot, Office 365, Google Analytics, Google Adwords, Bing Ads, Data Driven, Content, Web Analytics, E-Commerce, Inbound Marketing, CRO, Usability (UX).

education.degree_name: Master of Science (MSc), Business Administration - Information & Knowledge Management

certifications.name: HubSpot Architecture I: Data Models and APIs

profile_positions.description:
Bright Digital is een ambitieus inbound marketing bureau. Onze kracht ligt in een full-service aanpak die strategie combineert met content en marketing technologie, waardoor de business van onze klanten exponentieel groeit. Als ervaren HubSpot Diamond Partner leveren wij inbound marketing diensten zoals persona ontwikkeling, website ontwikkeling, SEO, SEA, lead framework implementatie (MQL, SQL etc.) geautomatiseerde lead nurturing en closed loop marketing analytics. Meer weten? Ga naar onze website www.brightdigital.com

Werkzaamheden:
➛ HubSpot advies, implementatie en onboarding
➛ HubSpot technische support
➛ HubSpot health checks & clean-up
➛ HubSpot migraties
➛ Consultancy m.b.t. marketing strategie (persona's, customer journey, positioning)
➛ Campagne management klanten (planning, coördinatie, uitvoering)

profile_positions.description:
Some of my activites:
➛ Optimizing marketing automation with Hubspot for all active countries (Belgium, Netherlands, France, Spain, Italy and Germany)

➛ Managing SEO agencies across all active countries
➛ Reporting/forecasting on results/KPI's
➛ As a projectleader renewing Teamleader's Referral program and creating the associated cross-country marketing campaigns

and marketing units for all active countries

profile_positions.title: Online Marketeer

profile_positions.description:
Wonderful learning experience within the marketing department of Nestlé Infant Nutrition Benelux. During six months I was part of the Digital/CRM team, which is located in Amstelveen.

I developed a dashboard for monitoring the digital environment and used Google Analytics extensively to get the required data, I was involved in creating a content strategy from scratch to improve and optimize the overall search strategy (SEO & SEA), performed social listening using Radian6, developed an acquisition strategy for the Nestlé Baby Club, I was managing the renewing of the offline direct mailings and finally I was closely involved in the process of moving to a new responsive mobile website (including UAT testing).
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Intern
